tooltip.attach: When enabled, you must provide a form and a field of this form. All selected rows will be attached to a record from this form. The user will be able to choose which record using a the given field

mail.selectDistributionList: Select the distribution list that will set recipients of the email
mail.selectTemplates: Select the email templates users will be allowed to choose from when using the action

tooltip.notify: When enabled, you must provide a channel and a message. All selected rows will be sent as a single notification on the specified channel. The provided message is used to define the notification’s action
tooltip.publish: When enabled, you must provide a channel. All selected rows will be sent as a single publication on the specified channel. Everyone listening to this channel can receive the records

actions.add: If authorized, user can add new records using selected template
actions.convert: If authorized, user can convert record using another template of selected resource
actions.delete: If authorized, user can delete visible records
actions.export: User can export selected columns of visible records
actions.goTo: User can go to specified page on click
actions.inline: If authorized, user can edit records in the grid
actions.show: User can see full history of visible records
actions.showDetails: User can see full details of visible records
actions.update: If authorized, user can update visible records
